citation.quoteText: Now, young Skywalker, you will die.
citation.author: Emperor Palpatine

citation.quoteText: Just for once, let me look on you with my own eyes.
citation.author: Anakin Skywalker

citation.quoteText: In time, the suffering of your people will persuade you to see our point of view.
citation.author: Nute Gunray

citation.quoteText: You can’t stop the change, any more than you can stop the suns from setting.
citation.author: Shmi Skywalker

citation.quoteText: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.
citation.author: Yoda

citation.quoteText: Well, if droids could think, there’d be none of us here, would there?
citation.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

citation.quoteText: We must keep our faith in the Republic. The day we stop believing democracy can work is the day we lose it.
citation.author: Queen Jamillia

citation.quoteText: I’m just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.
citation.author: Jango Fett

citation.quoteText: What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith?
citation.author: Count Dooku
